painPoints.description: Poor website design and user experience that does not reflect the upscale nature of the club.
supportingQuotes: I just find it to be really drab. The photography is boring. The fonts are boring. The colors are boring.
It's very stale and old-fashioned compared to anything. And too many words and not enough bullet points.
painPoints.frequencySeverity: Frequently mentioned, with strong emotional intensity.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users navigate through the current site despite its issues, but it is not user-friendly.
painPoints.impactOnUser: Frustration leads to decreased interest in engaging with the club or its offerings.

painPoints.description: Challenges in communication among committee members due to limitations in the app.
supportingQuotes: I wish there was a way... just either press the email address of a person or press the phone number of a person and have it go through.
I find myself having to copy it or add it as a contact and write down the phone number and type it back in again.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users are creating smaller group texts instead of using the app.
painPoints.impactOnUser: Increased effort and time spent on communication, leading to inefficiency.

painPoints.description: Lack of a central platform for information sharing and recommendations among members.
supportingQuotes: If there were some closed forum that was like that would be a huge help to current, to members.
I wish that there was even a member event... that would include how to get your driver's license. How do I find a new doctor?
painPoints.frequencySeverity: Frequently mentioned, with high emotional intensity regarding the need for support.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Members rely on informal channels for information, which may not be reliable.
painPoints.impactOnUser: New members feel lost and unsupported, affecting their integration into the community.

painPoints.description: Difficulties in the membership application process on the website.
supportingQuotes: It really is hard to find the button that allows you to begin a membership application.
If I were on the website and not logged in, I don't know how you... find out about becoming a member.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users may ask existing members for guidance on how to join.
painPoints.impactOnUser: Potential new members may abandon the process due to confusion, impacting club growth.

painPoints.description: Limited resources and guidance for newcomers on essential local services.
supportingQuotes: I think that if there were a way to host some of this information that are, you know, government sites...
Somebody mentioned to me, I wish that there was even a member event... that would include how to get your driver's license.
painPoints.frequencySeverity: Frequently mentioned, with strong emotional intensity.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: New members rely on word-of-mouth and personal networks for information.
painPoints.impactOnUser: New members feel overwhelmed and unsupported, making their transition more challenging.
